rows.label: tlk41700126_02_msg0001
rows.name:
That little lady Hotaru
truly loves plants from
the bottom of her heart.

rows.label: tlk41700126_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I'd love to go on a journey with
her someday, traveling to see
plants all over the world.

rows.label: tlk41700126_02_msg0003
rows.name:
When that time comes, as a man,
I promise I'll protect her.

rows.label: tlk41700126_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Ahh, if only I had the
aptitude of a Driver.

rows.label: tlk41700126_02_msg0005
rows.name:
To have such a cute Blade
with you... I'm envious
in more ways than one.
